data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Can Parma capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brescia's half?
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Parma.
Brescia have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Brescia close to the penalty box.
In the minute 4, Lorenzo Maggioni signals a free kick to Parma.
Lorenzo Maggioni awards the away team a throw-in.
Lorenzo Maggioni signals a free kick to Parma in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Parma in the half of Brescia.
Can Parma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brescia's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Brescia.
In the minute 10, Brescia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Parma are coming forward and Dejan Kulusevski gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Brescia goal kick.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Brescia.
Brescia awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Stadio Mario Rigamonti, Parma are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 16, Lorenzo Maggioni signals a Brescia throw-in in Parma's half.
Lorenzo Maggioni awards Parma a goal kick.
In Brescia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 19, Parma to take a throw-in in Brescia territory.
Throw-in for Brescia at Stadio Mario Rigamonti.
Free kick for Brescia in their own half.
In the minute 20, Free kick Parma.
Brescia's Ernesto Torregrossa has been booked in Brescia.
Throw-in for Parma in their own half.
In the minute 22, Goal kick for Parma at Stadio Mario Rigamonti.
Goal kick for Parma at Stadio Mario Rigamonti.
Lorenzo Maggioni signals a free kick to Parma in their own half.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Parma in the half of Brescia.
Parma's Jasmin Kurtic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Brescia goal kick.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Parma in their own half.
Lorenzo Maggioni signals a throw-in for Parma, close to Brescia's area.
Free kick Parma.
In the minute 29, Daniele Dessena for Brescia has been booked by Lorenzo Maggioni and receives a first yellow card.
In Brescia Parma attack through Juraj Kucka. The finish is off target, however.
Brescia have a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Ball safe as Parma is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lorenzo Maggioni signals a free kick to Brescia.
Parma awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Brescia drives forward and Florian Aye gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Dejan Kulusevski (Parma) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Parma have been awarded a corner by Lorenzo Maggioni.
In the minute 38, In Brescia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Brescia awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Can Brescia capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Brescia's Sandro Tonali gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Parma defender.
Brescia have been awarded a corner by Lorenzo Maggioni.
In the minute 42, Brescia surge into the attack at Stadio Mario Rigamonti but Daniele Dessenaâ€™s header is off-target.
Lorenzo Maggioni awards Parma a goal kick.
Lorenzo Maggioni awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 44, Can Brescia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Parma's half?
Daniele Dessena for Brescia drives towards goal at Stadio Mario Rigamonti. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Lorenzo Maggioni signals a free kick to Parma just outside Brescia's area.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Brescia.
Throw-in for Brescia in the half of Parma.
In the minute 45, Brescia's Nikolas Spalek misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brescia.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 45, Ales Mateju (Brescia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Brescia.
Parma have a goal kick.
Parma's Dejan Kulusevski gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Mario Rigamonti. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Brescia.
Free kick for Brescia in the half of Parma.
Gianluca Caprari hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Parma!
In the minute 49, Brescia's Florian Aye is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Brescia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Ball safe as Brescia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Parma's Juraj Kucka breaks free at Stadio Mario Rigamonti. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Brescia goal kick.
In the minute 52, Florian Aye is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for Brescia in their own half.
Florian Aye is back on his feet again.
In the minute 55, Parma pushes forward through Gianluca Caprari, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Brescia at Stadio Mario Rigamonti.
Free kick for Brescia in the half of Parma.
In the minute 56, Parma awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lorenzo Maggioni signals a Brescia throw-in in Parma's half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in high up the field for Brescia in Brescia.
Brescia are pushing forward but Ernesto Torregrossa's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brescia.
Luca Siligardi is replacing Juraj Kucka for the away team.
In the minute 59, Goal! Matteo Darmian gives Parma a 0-1 lead in Brescia.
Dejan Kulusevski instrumental with a fine assist.
Brescia to take a throw-in in Parma territory.
In the minute 60, Lorenzo Maggioni signals a free kick to Brescia in their own half.
Brescia have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Parma in their own half.
Daniele Dessena levels the score at 1-1.
Ernesto Torregrossa with an assist there.
In the minute 64, In Brescia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Parma drive upfield and Dejan Kulusevski gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Brescia defender.
Daniele Gastaldello is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 66, It seems as if Daniele Gastaldello is unable to continue. Andrea Papetti replaces him for the home team.
Throw-in for Parma in the half of Brescia.
In Brescia Brescia drive forward through Florian Aye. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 68, Nikolas Spalek gets his shot on target but fails to score for Brescia.
Roberto D'Aversa is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Mario Rigamonti with Giuseppe Pezzella replacing Simone Iacoponi.
Mattia Sprocati is replacing Gianluca Caprari for Parma at Stadio Mario Rigamonti.
In the minute 70, Parma make their fourth substitution with Bruno Alves replacing Vincent Laurini.
Brescia needs to be cautious. Parma have an attacking throw-in.
Parma advance rapidly upfield but Lorenzo Maggioni blows for offside.
In the minute 74, Luca Siligardi for Parma gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Brescia at Stadio Mario Rigamonti.
Lorenzo Maggioni signals a Brescia throw-in in Parma's half.
In the minute 75, Can Parma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brescia's half?
Lorenzo Maggioni signals a free kick to Brescia in their own half.
Lorenzo Maggioni signals a free kick to Brescia.
In the minute 76, The away team replace Gervinho with Roberto Inglese.
Free kick for Parma in their own half.
Brescia to take a throw-in in Parma territory.
In the minute 78, Brescia's Sandro Tonali gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Mario Rigamonti. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Parma in the half of Brescia.
The home team have replaced Nikolas Spalek with Bruno Martella. This is the second substitution made today by Diego Lopez.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Brescia at Stadio Mario Rigamonti.
Throw-in high up the field for Parma in Brescia.
Can Parma get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brescia's half?
In the minute 81, Dejan Kulusevski scores to make it 1-2 at Stadio Mario Rigamonti.
That's a fine assist from Luca Siligardi.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Brescia close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Brescia.
Brescia to take a throw-in in Parma territory.
In the minute 84, Brescia have been awarded a corner by Lorenzo Maggioni.
Brescia have been awarded a corner by Lorenzo Maggioni.
Florian Aye (Brescia) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 85, Lorenzo Maggioni awards Parma a goal kick.
Lorenzo Maggioni signals a Brescia throw-in in Parma's half.
Mattia Sprocati for Parma drives towards goal at Stadio Mario Rigamonti. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Parma.
Free kick Brescia.
Diego Lopez (Brescia) is making a third substitution, with Andrea Ghezzi replacing Alessandro Semprini.
In the minute 89, Lorenzo Maggioni awards the home team a throw-in.
Parma awarded a free kick in their own half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Luca Siligardi of Parma gets in a strike, but is off target.
Brescia have a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Parma close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Brescia in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Brescia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Brescia in the half of Parma.
Lorenzo Maggioni awards Parma a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
At Stadio Mario Rigamonti, Andrea Papetti has been yellow-carded for the home team.
